Headline: #94 California Temporary Northbound Reroute near Belmont/Campbell
ShortDescription: NB 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, Belmont, Western, Roscoe, and Campbell due to, street blockage near Belmont/Campbell.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier track condition at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Yellow Line Running with Delays; Boarding change at Howard
ShortDescription: Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track conditions at Howard; board/exit all trains on the 95th-bound side at Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Yellow Line service running w/delays due to track conditions at Howard; board/exit all trains on the 95th-bound side at Howard.

Dempster/Skokie-bound trains are departing from this platform due to track conditions at Howard.
